review: A fresh version, this is all about purity. Elegant and balanced, with crisp apple, citrus and mineral notes holding court. The finish lingers nicely. A style for enjoying soon. Drink now through 2012. 50 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Combettes
review: Full, round and focused, with generous pear, almond, nutmeg and honey aromas and flavors. The honey comes through strong on the finish. Drink now.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Folatières
review: Distinctively earthy, it draws energy from the soil, with mineral and wet earth notes, blending (strangely) white truffle and pineapple in a concoction that's attractive thanks to a supple, harmonious mouthfeel. Long, lime-tinged finish. Drink now through 2004.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Perrières
review: Firm and focused. A spicy, apple-scented wine that keeps pumping out the flavors, with nice honey notes livening up the aroma and finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Referts
review: Has a tightly wound midpalate, where mineral and a zoo of fruit flavors run wild, but it settles down to perform a good act on the crisp finish. Best from 2001 through 2007. 590 cases made.

name: Bienvenues-Bâtard-Montrachet
review: Pretty and full-bodied. Silky and ripe flavors--marzipan, honey, ripe pea and piecrust--with some peach and apricot notes. Ready to enjoy now, and through 1998.

name: Bourgogne White
review: A balanced, round version, exhibiting apple, melon and lemon zest flavors. Shows a lean, refreshing character on the finish. Drink now through 2013. 180 cases imported.

name: Bourgogne White
review: Ripe and rich, with wonderful balance and supple texture, it's full-bodied and shows a panoply of honey, wild flower, mineral, spice and citrus flavors. Has a lingering, juicy finish hinting at good acidity; try after 2000.

name: Chassagne-Montrachet
review: A concentrated white, dense and muscular, but also slightly coarse in texture. The apple, lemon drop and pastry notes persist through the long, lingering finish. Best from 2013 through 2021. 128 cases imported.

name: Chevalier-Montrachet
review: Complex aromas and flavors of straw, apple and mineral and a hint of spice. Medium-to-full-bodied; long finish. Needs time. Try after 1996. 15 cases made.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Almost oily in texture, this white delivers acacia, lime blossom, nut oil and citrus aromas and flavors on a medium-bodied frame. Moderate length. Best from 2011 through 2016. 410 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Champ Canet
review: Lots going on here: gorgeous texture of fruit and creamy acidity, medium-to-full body and honey, apple and mineral finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet La Garenne
review: Exotic and tropical, with pineapple, guava and mango flavors mingling with the lime and apple notes. This medium-bodied white is ripe, soft and very appealing, showing enough crisp flavors to hold it all together on the medium-intense finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Combettes
review: Lively and rich, packed with ripe pineapple, pear and honey flavors. It makes for a deep, chewy-textured, fully ripe style of white Burgundy. Enjoy now for its opulence, or hold until 1997. 825 cases made.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Folatières
review: What a pure, clean and fruity wine. Packed with flavor, this medium-bodied, minerally '96 offers plenty of character. Juicy and mouthpuckering now, it has the stuffing to age. Best after 2003. 540 cases made.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Perrières
review: Pretty Puligny. Medium-bodied, with some good ripe fruit, toasted notes from the oak, honey and a lingering, elegant finish. Drink now through 2005. 80 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Perrières
review: This attractive, medium-bodied white Burgundy displays toast, passion fruit, earth and green apple quality. Nice ripeness and a succulent, crisp finish. Best from 2001 through 2005. 430 cases made.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Perrières
review: A forward style that's rich and toasty in flavor right through the finish. Very buttery, with caramel and apple aromas and flavors. Round and buttery on the finish. Drink now.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Fresh and elegant, showing lemon, hazelnut, spice and mineral aromas and flavors matched to a lean profile and firm structure. It's well-balanced and poised to develop well over time. Drink now through 2008. 195 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Lovely and balanced, with good mineral, pear, apple and spice character. Of medium body, it shows some sweet, ripe fruit and good length. Best after 2005. 2,300 cases made.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Full-bodied and complex, with some lovely fig, tropical, spice, honey and cigar box flavors. A touch hot and burning on the finish. Drink now through 1998.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Rich and intense, with concentrated pear, spice, nutmeg and butterscotch notes that turn smoky on the finish. Complex and young, with a long, full finish. Drink now.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Champ Canet
review: Forward in style, with very ripe fruit character. Has a rather advanced gold color, with overripe aromas of fruit and honey. Full-bodied, with a fat mouth-feel, cream and apple flavors and a light, toasty finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Hameau de Blagny
review: Light, with lemony acidity leaning toward the tart side in terms of balance. Racy, but lacks the intensity of the best in this category. Drink now through 2010. 25 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Combettes
review: Round and rather rich, but also quite oaky, showing herb, spice and vanilla flavors and some chalky notes on the finish. Try in 1997.

name: St.-Romain
review: A distinctive expression of citrus and mineral notes on a sleek, firm frame. Attractive more for purity than intensity. Moderate length. Drink now through 2007. 125 cases imported.

name: Bourgogne White
review: Floral, apple and citrus flavors ride the bright structure, picking up a citrus peel element on the finish. There's also savory element. Drink now. 250 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Starts out subtly, with notes of apple, spice and a touch of citrus, but the acidity keeps this bright and persistent on the finish. Drink now through 2012. 400 cases imported.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: Flavorful and quite ripe honey, hazelnut and earth flavors are knitted nicely together. Medium-bodied; vibrant, long finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet
review: A steely, appley wine, with round texture, medium body and a fresh finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet La Garenne
review: Medium-bodied, showing honey and lemon. The mouthfeel is round but the finish turns crisp. Cellar short-term. Best from 2000 through 2003. 500 cases made.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Referts
review: Rich coconut, pear and relatively ripe fruit character, medium-to-full body and fresh acidity on the finish.

name: Puligny-Montrachet Les Referts
review: A good Puligny, with apple, straw, honey aromas and flavors, medium body and a light finish. Drinkable now.

name: St.-Aubin 1er Cru
review: On the lean side, with oak spice, apple and grapefruit peel dominating the flavors. Has moderate length on the finish. Best from 2008 through 2014. 50 cases imported.

name: Bourgogne White
review: A clean, unadorned style, with apple and lemon notes. Harmonious, with a bright structure. A good example of what Chardonnay really tastes like. Drink now. 200 cases imported.

name: Chassagne-Montrachet
review: Silky-smooth, this full-bodied white Burgundy displays a canvas of vanilla bean, cream, pear and burnt toast character. Chewy, smoky aftertaste. For amateurs of charred barrels. Drink now through 2005. 365 cases made.

name: Chassagne-Montrachet
review: Quite ripe, distinctive, silky texture. Mineral, pear and apple flavors come together nicely on the medium-long finish. Drinkable now or try in 1996.

name: Chevalier-Montrachet
review: Clean and fresh, with some vibrant citrus combining with ripe pear, melon and toasted hazelnut complexity. Medium-bodied, with a crisp finish. This was the better of two bottles. Drink now through 2005. 20 cases imported.

name: Riesling Trockenbeerenauslese Pfalz Siebeldinger Im Sonnenschein
review: A beauty. Elegant, balanced and full of finesse, this exhibits pure apricot and peach notes with a touch of citrus. It's persistent and vibrant, with a lingering aftertaste of grilled nuts. Drink now through 2040. 15 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: Offers rapierlike focus and acidity to the concentrated and explosively fruity green apple, white cherry and jasmine flavors. Dried sage and chamomile notes linger on the powerful, well-structured finish, showing some hints of white pepper. Complex and refined. Drink now through 2026. 250 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: There's an element of austerity to this Riesling, but it screams mineral, along with white peach and grapefruit flavors allied to a supple texture. The vibrant structure keeps it all in line as this cruises to a long, lees- and stone-filled aftertaste. Needs a little time, but should develop well. Best from 2013 through 2024. 500 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Birkweiler Kastanienbusch
review: Seductive aromas of smoke, spice and apricot introduce this silken-textured, dry white. A vibrant structure, intense flavors and a harmony among all its elements are its hallmarks. Drink now through 2012. 300 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn Im Sonnenschein GG
review: This fruity version is filled with dark currant, white raspberry and fresh-cut nectarine flavors that are mouthwatering and carry a spicy richness. Offers engaging minerality, leading to an elegant finish that is sculpted and long, accented by savory hints. Drink now through 2025. 250 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: A concentrated, dry white, featuring ripe peach and apricot flavors, a viscous texture and a core of mineral. This is balanced, with the mineral carrying through. Picks up a spice note on the lingering finish. Best from 2011 through 2023. 50 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganshorn Im Sonnenschein GG
review: A beauty, from the complex aromas of grapefruit, fruit blossom and mineral to the elegant profile and silky texture. This is harmonious and refined, with a lingering aftertaste of citrus and mineral salt. Best from 2012 through 2019. 350 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn Im Sonnenschein GG
review: A richly fruity style, with loads of ripe red peach, dried apricot and dried raspberry flavors, lavishly spiced. A plush creaminess fills the finish, along with dried tropical fruit details. Drink now through 2020. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein
review: Lush, sporting dried apricot, mango and licorice notes, this is a powerful, intense, dry white. Very concentrated, showing some heat and a strong white pepper aftertaste. Still youthful, this needs time to develop. Better than previously reviewed. Drink now through 2015. 440 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: An elegant, refined and powerful dry Riesling that offers intensely concentrated flavors of Fuji apple, lemon-lime and kiwifruit. Dried sage notes emerge on the finish, delivering plenty of lingering minerality. Drink now through 2025. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Features racy acidity, with power and purity behind the green apple, pear and green peach flavors, which are anchored in a lattice of vibrant acidity. The ripe melon and savory notes add complexity, leading to a rich and creamy finish. Drink now through 2020. 750 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Exotic notes of apricot and passion fruit highlight this big-boned, firmly structured Riesling, which is a little awkward now, still needing time for all its components to integrate. Best from 2013 through 2020. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Enticing aromas of flowers, citrus and peach are complemented by apple and peach flavors in this silky smooth dry Riesling, which is long and beautifully balanced, with a nicely enmeshed structure. Drink now through 2018. 160 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Lean and tightly wound, with intense minerally and savory flavors. Firmly structured, this will require time to relax and allow all its elements to shine. The potential is revealed on the long, stony aftertaste. Best from 2011 through 2023. 50 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn Im Sonnenschein GG
review: A powerful, concentrated Riesling, this sports grapefruit, white peach, melon and white pepper aromas and flavors. There's adequate structure to keep it balanced and long, but this is ripe and accessible now. Drink now through 2018. 400 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein
review: A terrific dry Riesling, this is round and generous, displaying grapefruit, quince and spice aromas and flavors. Seems soft initially, yet there's enough acidity, which appears on the finish. Best from 2008 through 2014. 125 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Filled with lavender and chamomile notes, this shows a savory accent to the green peach, crisp apple and lemongrass flavors. The finish is filled with hints of tarragon and ginger, with touches of cream. Drink now through 2018. 200 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch
review: Floral and talcum powder aromas and mineral flavors highlight this dry Riesling. It's creamy in texture, with a lively spine that accentuates a lingering grapefruit and mineral note on the finish. Drink now through 2015. 50 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: Offers hints of white pepper to the crisp, rich flavors of fresh-cut apple, glazed apricot and lemon-lime. Spice notes cascade through the long, ripe finish. Drink now through 2018. 500 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: Fruity and precise, with pure-tasting flavors of concentrated tangerine, apricot and green apple. Intense jellied citrus notes fill in midpalate, setting up a long, luscious finish of spice and cream. Drink now through 2020. 375 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Siebeldinger Im Sonnenschein
review: Elegant, offering floral and peach notes backed by stony accents. Slim and focused, with a gracefulness that extends to the finish, where it turns crisp. Drink now through 2012. 215 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: Rich yet delicate, with apricot and peach, and a blast of grapefruit keeping it all mouthwatering and fresh. It's balanced and ends with a mineral tang. Expressive from start to finish, and long. Best from 2010 through 2020. 25 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn im Sonnenschein GG
review: This offers a lively mix of light, smoky accents to the concentrated and integrated apple and green peach flavors. Lemon curd and currant notes fill the well-spiced finish. Drink now through 2018. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn im Sonnenschein GG
review: Apple pie and pastry notes dominate this medium-bodied Riesling, with lemon-lime and ripe melon notes. Sage and oregano accents provide the seasoning, revealing mineral and sea salt elements on the richly crafted finish. Drink now through 2020. 250 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn im Sonnenschein GG
review: Very zesty, with lots of citrus and green apple flavors that are backed up by plenty of fresh acidity. The crisp finish features some hints of white pepper and sea salt, with splashes of mineral. Best from 2014 through 2022. 380 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Pure and minerally, with a vibrant lushness to the flavors of dried apple, white raspberry and ripe melon. Spicy and honeyed on the finish, revealing notes of dried basil and thyme. Drink now through . 250 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Bright and juicy, with ripe citrus, fresh-cut green apple and dried savory herbal flavors. Melon and ruby grapefruit accents emerge midpalate, with a long and rich-tasting finish. Drink now through 2020. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Passion fruit, grapefruit and a hint of spice mark this dry white. It's more tightly wound than its counterparts, with a rich texture and moderately firm structure. White pepper aftertaste. Best from 2009 through 2016. 15 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch
review: Rich and spicy, exhibiting clove, nutmeg and cardamom notes, with accents of apple and grapefruit. The key is in its balance, where all the elements look set to harmonize. Fine length. Best from 2008 through 2014. 175 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: Rich, with lots of jellied citrus and ripe peach flavors that are accented by plenty of smoky notes. Features dried apricot and mineral on the finish, with hints of lavender. Drink now through 2022. 530 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: This white offers quince and nectarine, grapefruit and white pepper flavors. Though dry, this is very fruity, giving an impression of sweetness. The bracing acidity and long, firm finish dispel any such notion. Best from 2012 through 2018. 450 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Pfalz Kastanienbusch
review: Rich, ripe and broad-textured, with an exotic caste to the flavors of roast pineapple, dried fig and dried mango. Very spicy midpalate, presenting notes of lemon meringue on the finish. Drink now through 2033. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Pfalz Vom Rotliegenden
review: Nice spice and citrus tones grace peach, apple and pear notes. There's a prominent mineral edge too. All is on an elegant frame, with a lingering finish. Best from 2010 through 2020. 25 cases imported.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Muschelkalk
review: A dry white, with a smoky aroma, hinting at pineapple and grapefruit flavors along with a mineral element. It's round and balanced, with a distinctive citrus-and-mineral aftertaste. Drink now through 2016. 25 cases imported.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Rotliegenden
review: Aromas and flavors of lees, spice and grapefruit mark this slightly austere white, yet it's succulent and stony, with fine length. Best from 2012 through 2018. 350 cases made.

name: Spätburgunder Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Tradition
review: This is fresh and fruity, sporting cherry, raspberry and blackberry flavors, joined by a touch of spice. This is dense, with a light grain to its tannins and bright finish. Drink now through 2018.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Ganz Horn Im Sonnenschein GG
review: Taut, with a sinewy texture to the dried apple, grapefruit and lemon-lime flavors, supported by firm acidity. Savory notes linger on the fresh, engaging finish. Drink now through 2018. 250 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein
review: Bracing, with a lemon acidity, this dry Riesling begins with richness and weight, then turns leaner, with citrus, apple and peach notes. For fans of laserlike acidity. Be patient. Best from 2007 through 2015. 50 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Im Sonnenschein GG
review: This has lots of smokiness and ripe bacon fat flavors that are broad and rich-tasting. The firm finish offers plenty of citrus notes. Drink now through 2018. 200 cases made.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: The ripe apple, grapefruit and honeydew melon flavors are rich and complex in this spicy style. The creamy finish is long and plush, showing hints of sage honey. Drink now through 2018. 250 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz
review: This is a solid version, delivering grapefruit, apple and white pepper aromas and flavors. Racy and a bit severe right now, yet intense and persistent. Needs time to come together. Best from 2013 through 2022. 650 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: On the racy side, with expressive white peach, pear and grapefruit flavors. This has good depth and balance for the category, with a cleansing aftertaste. Best from 2011 through 2018. 550 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: Generous and open, but with no shortage of concentration. Rose, grapefruit and white peach flavors are persistent, lingering on the finish. Well-balanced and dry. Drink now through 2012. 500 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Muschelkalk "S"
review: Taut, with focused flavors of spiced peach and apple, which are joined by hints of white chocolate. Powerfully bracing on the finish. Drink now through 2018. 400 cases made.

name: Riesling Auslese Pfalz Siebeldinger Im Sonnenschein
review: Lightweight and lively, showing ripe apricot and honey notes, with a citrus accent. Fresh and persistent through the moderate finish. Drink now through 2012. 48 cases made.

name: Riesling QbA Pfalz Dry
review: Concentrated grapefruit and green apple flavors are supported by fresh acidity. Smoky hints on the finish, with notes of dried sage and citrus zest.  Drink now. 300 cases imported.

name: Riesling QbA Pfalz Dry
review: Taut and focused, with notes of elderflower and honeysuckle to the apple, pear and citrus flavors. Shows good cut on the finish, delivering plenty of ripe melon accents. Drink now through 2016. 196 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch
review: Ripe and creamy, with candied apple, but this lacks oomph and flavor intensity midpalate. Drink now. 265 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Muschelkalk
review: Racy, with quince, passion fruit and mineral notes offset by the tangy structure. This has fine balance, with a lingering, resonant finish. Best from 2011 through 2018. 150 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Rotliegenden
review: Peach and almond flavors are surrounded by a rich texture, all underscored by firm structure. Turns spicy and leaner on the finish. Best from 2010 through 2016. 50 cases imported.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Rotliegenden
review: Medium- to full-bodied, with grapefruit peel and apple flavors. Has a creamy texture, slightly milky even, with good underlying acidity and minerality. Needs time. Best from 2008 through 2012. 220 cases made.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Rotliegenden "S"
review: Bass notes give dimension to the peach, stone and melon notes in this powerful white, which could use a little more stuffing midpalate, but just needs time to flesh out. Best from 2013 through 2022. 300 cases made.

name: Weissburgunder QbA Trocken Pfalz
review: Firm and savory, with concentrated nectarine, green apple and kiwifruit flavors supported by fresh acidity. The finish offers flinty and saline accents.  Drink now through 2019. 300 cases imported.

name: Riesling QbA Trocken Pfalz
review: This offers plenty of pastry and buttery notes to the ripe apple, pear tart and lemon curd flavors. The vibrant finish has a golden-raisin edge and hints of smoke. Drink now through 2018. 350 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Birkweiler
review: This is exotic and rich-tasting, featuring lush flavors of roasted white fruits, with smoky notes. White chocolate on the finish.  Drink now through 2017. 55 cases imported.

name: Riesling Qualitätswein Trocken Pfalz Kastanienbusch GG
review: A lush, dry white, with apricot and hints of orange and pineapple flavors. Soft and open, with an easygoing profile and moderate length. Drink now through 2012. 15 cases imported.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: There's more bones than flesh in this lean, grapefruit- and spice-flavored white. Hints of smoke and chalk allude to its mineral element, and the finish is dry and mouthwatering. Best from 2010 through 2016. 50 cases imported.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: Powerful and rich, this offsets its apricot and peach notes with mineral and white pepper accents. It's a little austere on the finish, but should even out in a few months. Drink now through 2010.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: Rich and open-knit, with a lively structure buoying the peach and apricot notes. Dry, and turning a touch austere on the finish, with a white pepper aftertaste. Drink now through 2009. 450 cases made.

name: Riesling QbA Pfalz Dry
review: Crisp and savory, with flavors of dried mint to the grapefruit, gooseberry and dried sage notes. Juicy acidity on the finish.  Drink now through 2018. 330 cases imported.

name: Riesling QbA Trocken Pfalz
review: Dry and spicy, this shows moderate concentration and length. Firm and clean. Drink now through 2012. 300 cases made.

name: Riesling QbA Pfalz Dry
review: Taut, with slate and spice notes to the green apple and peach flavors. Features hints of scallion on the spicy finish. Drink now. 168 cases imported.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: This is dry and focused, with grapefruit, floral and mineral notes backed by prominent acidity. Well-balanced with a moderate finish. Drink now through 2007. 610 cases made.

name: Riesling Kabinett Trocken Pfalz Vom Rotliegenden
review: Dry and spicy, showing attractive peach, grapefruit and white pepper notes in a lightweight, balanced presentation. Modest length. Drink now. 320 cases made.

name: Riesling Kabinett Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: Light and on the lean side, with grapefruit and white pepper notes. Overall, it's tart, so try with food. Drink now.

name: Riesling Spätlese Trocken Pfalz Vom Buntsandstein
review: An austere style, balanced toward sharp acidity. Modest apple and earth notes dissipate quickly. 20 cases imported.
